entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 except minus 8 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
